description: A flexible card component with header, content, and actions sections. Supports customizable styling, borders, shadows, and compound API for progressive migration.
usage: Used throughout the application as a container for content sections, forms, dashboards, and data display areas.

inputs.boxShadow: boolean - Enable box shadow on hover
inputs.title: React.ReactNode | string - Card title

description: A customizable avatar component with size variants, color options, and outline support. Extends Material-UI Avatar with additional styling options.
usage: User profiles, contact lists, chat interfaces, and anywhere user representation is needed.
size: Multiple sizes: badge (28px), xs (34px), sm (40px), md (60px), lg (72px), xl (82px)

other_metadata.accessibility: Supports alt text and ARIA labels

description: A simple slider component for selecting numeric values within a range. Built on Material-UI Slider with basic functionality.
usage: Settings panels, filters, volume controls, and any interface requiring range selection.

description: A responsive grid layout component using Material-UI Grid system. Demonstrates basic grid structure with multiple breakpoints.
usage: Page layouts, content organization, dashboard widgets, and responsive design patterns.
size: Responsive - Adapts to screen size with breakpoints

other_metadata.responsive: Supports xs, sm, md, lg, xl breakpoints

description: A complete login form component with email/password authentication, validation, social login options, and Supabase integration.
usage: Authentication pages, login modals, and user access control interfaces.

description: A collapsible drawer component for chat interfaces with user list, search functionality, and status management.
usage: Chat applications, messaging interfaces, and communication platforms.

description: An enterprise-grade login form with advanced validation, error handling, and notification integration using custom form hooks.
usage: Enterprise applications, admin panels, and systems requiring robust form validation.

other_metadata.validation: Email format, password length, required fields

description: A basic dialog component for displaying user selection lists with avatar support and add account functionality.

description: A comprehensive product display card with image, pricing, ratings, and add-to-cart functionality for e-commerce applications.

description: A landing page header component with animated content, responsive design, and call-to-action buttons.
